page_content: The page discusses psychosocial stress and conflict situations at the workplace and provides resources for dealing with them.
The page features stories from employees of the Canton of Basel-Stadt, discussing their roles and experiences in various sectors.
The page discusses traffic management tools such as signal systems, whose software is tailored for specific intersections.
The page provides information on parking facilities and a dynamic parking guidance system that directs drivers to available parking spaces.
The page provides information on visitor parking permits, including their types, validity, and pricing in Basel and Riehen.
The page provides information on road signage and guidelines for their uniform appearance to guide traffic effectively.
The page discusses the hierarchy of roads in Basel and plans for alleviating traffic congestion, including a major highway project.
